home.heroTitle: Supporting Your Family's Journey to Independent Mobility
home.heroSubtitle: A comprehensive program designed to help families of neurodivergent teens navigate the path to driving independence with evidence-based guidance and personalized support.
home.featuresSubtitle: Our platform provides everything you need to support your family's journey to driving independence.

modules.title: Interactive Modules
modules.description: Four comprehensive modules covering pre-permit preparation through learning to drive with engaging content and activities.

assessments.title: Personalized Assessments
assessments.description: Individualized recommendations and the Family Empowerment Scale to track readiness and progress.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Track milestones, celebrate achievements, and monitor permit acquisition progress.

coaching.title: Expert Coaching
coaching.description: Connect with trained coaches through messaging and video sessions for personalized guidance.

aiCoaching.title: AI-Assisted Guidance
aiCoaching.description: Get instant, evidence-based answers to your questions from our intelligent coaching assistant.

telecoaching.title: Telecoaching Sessions
telecoaching.description: Schedule video sessions with certified coaches for real-time support and guidance.

security.title: HIPAA Compliant
security.description: Your family's information is protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy standards.

modules.title: Learning Modules
modules.subtitle: Complete these modules at your own pace to support your family's journey to driving independence.
modules.prePermitDescription: Preparation before getting a learner's permit
modules.learningToDriveDescription: Support during the driving instruction phase
modules.noSteps: No steps available for this module yet.

module1.title: Preparing for Independent Mobility
module1.description: Building essential life skills for transportation independence.

module2.title: Ready to Learn to Drive
module2.description: Assessing readiness and preparing for the permit process.

module3.title: Learning to Drive
module3.description: Supporting the driving instruction process with practical guidance.

module4.title: Becoming an Independent Driver
module4.description: Transitioning to independent, safe driving habits.

auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your account
auth.registerDescription: Register to start your family's journey
auth.name: Full Name
auth.errorConfiguration: There is a problem with the server configuration
auth.errorAccessDenied: Access denied. You do not have permission to sign in
auth.errorVerification: The verification link has expired or is invalid

results.title: Assessment Results
results.notPassed: You did not pass this time. Consider reviewing the material.
results.noRecommendations: No specific recommendations at this time.

admin.recentActivityDescription: Latest user activity and system events
admin.selectFromSidebar: Select an option from the sidebar to get started
admin.featureInDevelopment: This feature is currently in development
admin.usersDescription: Manage user accounts, roles, and permissions
admin.contentDescription: Manage modules, steps, and educational content
admin.studiesDescription: Manage research studies and participant groups
admin.analyticsDescription: View usage statistics and progress reports
admin.createUserDescription: Add a new user to the system
admin.name: Name
admin.title: Title
admin.noSteps: No steps in this module yet
admin.csvExportsDescription: Download research data in CSV format for analysis. All exports include complete records and are suitable for import into Excel, SPSS, or other statistical software.
admin.piiWarning: Exported data may contain personally identifiable information (PII). Please handle exports in accordance with HIPAA/FERPA guidelines and your institution's data security policies.
admin.exportUserDataDescription: Export all user accounts with roles, preferences, and registration dates
admin.exportProgressDescription: Export user progress through modules and steps
admin.exportAssessmentsDescription: Export all assessment responses with scores and completion data
admin.exportEventsDescription: Export detailed timeline of all user activity events
admin.exportFamiliesDescription: Export family group data with member relationships
admin.exportHistoryDescription: All data exports are logged for audit purposes
admin.exportHistoryNote: Export history is recorded in the audit log and can be viewed by administrators.
admin.createStudyDescription: Set up a new research study with arms and randomization.
admin.createFirstStudy: Create your first research study to get started.
admin.randomizationDescription: Participants are randomly assigned to study arms based on allocation weights.
admin.selectStudy: Select a study to view details

coaching.title: Coaching Support
coaching.subtitle: Connect with your assigned coach for personalized guidance and support throughout your journey.
coaching.messageDescription: Send messages to your coach and receive personalized guidance.
coaching.startConversation: Start a conversation with your coach.
coaching.sessionsDescription: View and manage your upcoming coaching sessions.
coaching.requestSessionPrompt: Request a session to get started.
coaching.requestDescription: Schedule a video session with your coach for real-time support.
coaching.expectItem1: 30-minute video call with your assigned coach
coaching.expectItem2: Personalized guidance for your family's situation

permit.title: Permit Tracking
permit.subtitle: Track your teen's progress toward their driver's license.
permit.getStartedDescription: Begin tracking your teen's progress from permit to license.
permit.journeyDescription: Track your progress from permit to license.
